import React from'react';import{USD_SYMBOL,KHR_SYMBOL,formatUSD,formatKHR}from'../utils/formatters';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MenuItem(_ref){let{item,onAddItemToOrder}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-item",onClick:()=>onAddItemToOrder(item),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item-icon",children:item.icon||'☕️'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item-name-km",children:item.khmerName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item-name-en",children:item.englishName||''}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-price-usd",children:[USD_SYMBOL,formatUSD(item.priceUSD)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-price-khr",children:[KHR_SYMBOL,formatKHR(item.priceKHR)]})]})]});}export default MenuItem;
